name: clic-what-if
description: CLIC what if? esplora i metodi di aggiudicazione dell'offerta economicamente piu' vantaggiosa

scripts.package-win-64: electron-packager . --prune=true --ignore=extra --overwrite --out release-builds/ --platform=win32  --arch=x64  --icon=src/assets/icons/win/clic.ico --version-string.CompanyName="University of Trento" --version-string.FileDescription="" --version-string.ProductName="CLIC what if?"
scripts.package-win-32: electron-packager . --prune=true --ignore=extra --overwrite --out release-builds/ --platform=win32  --arch=ia32 --icon=src/assets/icons/win/clic.ico --version-string.CompanyName="University of Trento" --version-string.FileDescription="" --version-string.ProductName="CLIC what if?"
